message.raw: Changed: A possibility to initialize/close ODE multiple times recursively has been added. Also, now a call to dSpaceSetManualCleanup() is required for each space right after creation if ODE has been initialized in thread data manual cleanup mode.
message.html: Changed: A possibility to initialize/close ODE multiple times recursively has been added. Also, now a call to dSpaceSetManualCleanup() is required for each space right after creation if ODE has been initialized in thread data manual cleanup mode.
